data.title: Katie Holmes joins ‘Ray Donovan’ season 3
data.meta_description: <!–[CDATA[Katie Holmes is heading to "Ray Donovan's" third season in a major guest role, Showtime announced Tuesday. data.text:
<!–[CDATA[Katie Holmes is heading to "Ray Donovan's" third season in a major guest role, Showtime announced Tuesday.

Holmes will play a shrewd and chic businesswoman named Paige who enlists Ray's (Liev Schreiber) services. She also happens to be the daughter of Ian McShane's billionaire producer character, Andrew. McShane was cast in a recurring role earlier this month.

The 12-episode season of "Ray Donovan," a Mark Gordon Co. production, began production in Los Angeles on Jan. 26.
